ModMetaData.name: MultiLang Colorful Traits
ModMetaData.author: PirateBY
ModMetaData.description:
-Required HugsLib -Can be safe added or removed on existing savegame -Support all languages. This mod only add html tags for selected laguage
Included mod traits: -Core -HardcoreSk -RimJobWorld -AlienRaces -CombatExtended
Not all traits colored? 1. Settings->MultiLang Colorful Traits->Dump. ColorfulTraits_Dump.txt will be saved near Rimworld.exe 2. Check "Not colored defs" for target mod 3. Paste lines in to "/Defs/YOUR_DEF.xml" or in to existing xml's 4. Restart game
